title: How is France viewed in your country? - Quora

response.answer_text: I live in Europe most of the year and it would really depend on who you ask and what their relationship with France is or their personal opinion of it. It’s definitely not very popular, but it retains some of the traditional association with elegance to some people, while to others they tend to think of French arrogance. Generally I don’t think it’s one of the top rated or popular countries right now in people’s minds.
